name: CPAssistantCellConfiguration
desc: An object that provides the configuration attributes for the assistant cell.

items.name: init(position: CPListItem.AssistantCellPosition, visibility: CPListItem.AssistantCellVisibility, assistantAction: CPAssistantCellActionType)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified position, visibility, and action.

items.name: var position: CPListItem.AssistantCellPosition
items.desc: The position of the assistant cell in the list template.

items.name: var visibility: CPListItem.AssistantCellVisibility
items.desc: The visibility of the assistant cell in the list template.

items.name: var assistantAction: CPAssistantCellActionType
items.desc: The action that Siri performs when the user selects the assistant cell.

items.name: enum CPAssistantCellActionType
items.desc: The supported Siri actions of the assistant cell.
